columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) reflecting the time in which the event was generated.

columns.name: EventType
columns.description: The type of event.

columns.name: Id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the email.

columns.name: MessageId
columns.description: The message identifier of the email.

columns.name: Subject
columns.description: The subject of the email.

columns.name: FromEmail
columns.description: The email address of the sender.

columns.name: FromName
columns.description: The name of the sender.

columns.name: ReplyTo
columns.description: The reply-to email address.

columns.name: OriginatingIP
columns.description: The originating IP address of the email.

columns.name: SizeBytes
columns.description: The size of the email in bytes.

columns.name: SpamScore
columns.description: The spam score assigned to the email.

columns.name: SPF
columns.description: The SPF (Sender Policy Framework) result for the email.

columns.name: Risk
columns.description: The risk level assigned to the email.

columns.name: Category
columns.description: The risk category of the email.

columns.name: RiskSource
columns.description: The source of the risk assessment.

columns.name: ReportedRisk
columns.description: The reported risk score for the email.

columns.name: ReporterDomain
columns.description: The domain of the reporter.

columns.name: CompanyId
columns.description: The unique identifier for the company.

columns.name: FeedbackRequested
columns.description: Indicates if feedback was requested for the email.

columns.name: FeedbackProvided
columns.description: Indicates if feedback was provided for the email.

columns.name: ContentStatus
columns.description: The content status of the email.

columns.name: LinksCount
columns.description: The number of links in the email.

columns.name: AttachmentsCount
columns.description: The number of attachments in the email.

columns.name: SentAt
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) when the email was sent.

columns.name: ReportedAt
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) when the email was reported.

columns.name: AssessedAt
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) when the email was assessed.

columns.name: CheckedAt
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) when the email was checked.

columns.name: Links
columns.description: The links contained in the email.

columns.name: Attachments
columns.description: The attachments contained in the email.

columns.name: Headers
columns.description: The headers of the email.

columns.name: Assessments
columns.description: The assessments related to the email.
